.pull-left[
### Access
Right Radial, 5F  
Right Femoral, 6F  
JR 4, JL 3.5, 5F  
XB 4 Guide, 6F  
BMW x 1  

### Interventions
Predilation of mLAD  
Stent placement proximally  
Rewire into dLAD, additional stent placement  
]

.pull-right[
### Outcomes
- Successful stent placement and flow in LAD
- 2.5 x 34 mm DES to mLAD  
- 2.25 x 38 mm DES to dLAD
]

Right Femoral, 6F  
AL 0.75 Guide, 6F

IVUS to evaluate proximal/ostial lesion  
Shockwave IVL 
DES placement  
Post-dilation

- Calcium modification with Shockwave IVL 4.0 x 12 mm 
- 4.0 x 38 mm DES to mLAD
